recipe.title: Grilled Nectarines with Feta
ingredients: 1 cup coarsely crumbled feta cheese (preferably sheep's-milk feta)
instructions: Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Brush nectarines with butter. Grill nectarines, cut side down, until grill marks appear, 4 to 5 minutes. Turn nectarines over. Sprinkle with cheese, then pepper. Grill until grill marks appear on bottoms, 4 to 5 minutes.
